SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Design and construction of one Multi-deck Vehicle Storage Facility in the Port of Southampton.
It is anticipated the structure will be steel framed with either precast concrete or composite concrete decks.
The structure will have 5 suspended decks for vehicle storage of Import/Export trade through the Port of Southampton.
The footprint of the structure will be approximately be 2.9 acres/deck.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: No deposit is required with requests to participate. Details of Guarantees required under the contract will be advised in the tender documents or at pre-qualification stage. A 10 % performance guarantee bond and parent company guarantee will be required from the successful tenderer immediately following award of contract

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: The works are to be financed by ABP. Provision of payment, retention's and liquidated damages will be detailed in the conditions of contract.

LEGAL_FORM.P: The ICC Conditions of Contract Measurement Version (August 2011) as modified or added to by the ABP Special Conditions of Contract.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: The applicant must demonstrate previous experience and technical ability relating to projects of this nature. The applicants financial position and history must be strong and the applicant must accept the form of contract in III.1.3 and III.1.4 above.

F05_ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_CAPACITY.P: Information and formalities necessary for evaluating if the requirements are met:
1. Statement of the applicants overall turnover for the 3 preceding financial years.
2. The applicants full audited accounts for the 3 preceding financial years.
3. The applicants company registration number and details. This information shall also be provided for any parent company if applicable.

TECHNICAL_CAPACITY.P: The applicant will be assessed and awarded points used for evaluating the applications for the following; Contractors' construction technical capacity and previous experience carrying out similar works. Contract Conditions. Previous experience, capability and availability of key project personnel for the period of the contract. Organisational structure and project support. Health and Safety policy, accident record, management. Arrangements, training and competence of personnel. Environmental incident records, management.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: This is a pre-qualification exercise. Applicants must submit requests to participate and will be sent a full Pre-Qualification Questionnaire (PQQ). The completed PQQ will be used to determine a tender list and tender documents issued to those applicants who have successfully pre-qualified.
